login: SELECT * FROM "users" WHERE username = $1 AND password = $2
updateResetToken: UPDATE users SET reset_password_token = $1, reset_password_expires = $2 WHERE email = $3
findUserByResetToken: SELECT * FROM users WHERE reset_password_token = $1 AND reset_password_expires > $2
updatePassword: UPDATE users SET password = $1, reset_password_token = NULL, reset_password_expires = NULL WHERE reset_password_token = $2
